title: Effects of therapeutic ultrasound in patients with knee osteoarthritis: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Yan Luo, Masoud Rahmati, Abdolreza Kazemi, Wenbing Liu, Seung Won Lee, Razak M. Gyasi, Guillermo F. López Sánchez, Ai Koyanagi, Lee Smith, Dong Keon Yon
